title: A letter of His Excellencie the Lord General Monck, to the Speaker of the Parl. From Guild-Hall, London
author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
publisher: Printed by John Macock, in the year 1659. [i.e. 1660]
notes: Includes two Parliamentary responses, both dated: Thursday, February 9. 1659.
Enquiring whether he shall destroy the gates and portcullises of the City of London.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
